promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a dynamic basic hawk normal-type with a regal beak. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or hawk. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalis, a dynamic basic hawk normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: celebrate. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word hawk or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, hawk-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Regalis loves flying high in the sky, soaring through clouds in its celebratory pirouettes!
